# Swift Development Agent

Swift Development Agent for FSEvents API implementation and macOS app development for Phase 2 auto-commit functionality.

## Capabilities

- Swift/SwiftUI development
- macOS app development
- FSEvents API implementation
- Async/await patterns
- Error handling
